Review:
After some time, I visited Falabella in La Serena, and found this dispenser with pants that I thought had an excellent price. I took a pair and went to pay at the cash register, but it wasn't the price I thought, it was actually $29,990. I told the assistant that it wasn't my mistake, but theirs. I paid more attention to the price than to the product description.

Finally, the BRANCH MANAGER, Mrs. Luz María Díaz, arrived. She told me I was crazy for thinking that was the price, that I should look better, that it was my mistake and fault. I told her that I really went for the price, not the description, and that there were many more pairs of pants in the same situation in the dispenser. She adamantly refused and told me that if I wasn't going to pay the normal selling price, I should leave the cash register because I was impeding sales.

If I really wanted to take advantage of the mistake, I would have chosen several pairs, not just one. Besides, I don't think it's my mistake; the store should take responsibility for its own errors in location and prices.

In the end, I left the supposed purchase without effect. But as I was leaving the store, on the same floor, there were a bunch of stockers changing prices on the mislabeled and advertised product.

I hope to have better luck by leaving a note of complaint tomorrow at the store's management office since the lady manager was the highest-ranking person in the store, as she told me!

Después de algún tiempo visité Falabella en La Serena, encontré este dispensador con pantalones a mi parecer con un excelente precio, tome un par y me fui a cancelar a caja, peeeeeroooo no era el precio sino $29.990.- le comenté a la asistente que no era mi error sino de ellos, me fijé más en el precio que la descripción del producto
En fin llegó la GERENTE DE SUCURSAL Sra.  Luz María Díaz, la cual me dice que si estoy loco por pensar que ese era el precio, que mirara mejor, que era mi error y culpa
Le comenté que me fui realmente al precio, no a la descripción, y que habían muchos más pantalones en la misma situación en el dispensador, arremetió con un no rotundo y que si no iba a pagar lo que es el valor normal de venta me saliera de la caja ya que estaba entorpeciendo las ventas
Si realmente me hubiese querido aprovechar sabiendo del error no habría escogido uno sino varios, además creo no es mi error, la tienda debe responder por sus propios errores en ubicación y precios
En fin dejé la supuesta compra sin efecto peeeroooo al ir saliendo de la tienda en el mismo piso había un montón de reponedores cambiando precios en el producto mal etiquetado y publicitado su precio
Espero tener mejor suerte dejando mañana una nota de desagravio por la situación en gerencia de la misma tienda ya que la señora gerente era la única de más cargo en el local según me dijo!!

It must be that the bank is looking for unprepared people to pay them less money, and the consequences of this are poor (offensive) service. Furthermore, there are missed opportunities for the bank to make money. I recommend BICE bank, good service, good business opportunities.

You can get there from the Puerto Montt Bus Terminal, where you can find some routes from one or two companies with prices between 3,000 and 8,000 pesos, the latter being somewhat personalized. If you decide to take a taxi, the costs increase to 15,000 pesos or more.
It is a small place, with white and clean spaces.
Upon entering or exiting the airport, you will find car rental booths, go up the stairs passing through the security checkpoint, and on the other side, the waiting area where you are very close to the boarding gates.
